creditline: The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: small medallion incised with two snakes; loop of chain with twisted round and floral links at top; three similar dangling chains at bottom of medallion; two pendants in the shape of fish - one pendant unidentified (teardrop-shape with crescent)
dimension: 5 3/16 x 7/8 x 5/16 in. (13.18 x 2.22 x 0.79 cm) (including chain at top and pendants)
title: Pendant (?), one of a pair
